Virtual Playdates: Schedule virtual playdates with other children in your child's age group to encourage socialization and interaction.
Digital Art Projects: Encourage your child's creativity by providing them with digital art tools and platforms to create their own digital projects.
Parental Controls: Use parental controls to ensure that your child is accessing appropriate content and spending a healthy amount of time online.
Screen-Free Activities: Encourage your child to engage in screen-free activities such as reading, playing board games, or going outside to play.
Cyberbullying Education: Educate your child on the dangers of cyberbullying and teach them how to handle such situations if they encounter them online.
